participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, always eager to meet new people and share experiences.
participant_1.background: I'm a hard worker and I love my job. My eyes are brown. I also like to mountain bike. I wash my clothes when they start to stink from all the road trips. I have a laptop that allows me to easily share my travel pictures and stories with others.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, balancing her passions with her responsibilities as a parent.
participant_2.background: I had to give up my job to take care of my health. I want to be able to combine my two passions, football and technology, by creating a wearable device that can track my performance on the pitch. I'm the lead singer for an indie band. I have a soft spot for stuffed animals, and I'd love to get one for my baby's nursery. I am a stay at home mom.

content.text: Nice to meet you too! What do you do for work?
I'm a hard worker and I love my job. I'm also a mountain biker.
I had to give up my job to take care of my health, but I'm still the lead singer for an indie band.
That's so cool! Do you ever get to perform live?
Not as much as I'd like to, but I'm hoping to get back to it soon.
I'm sure you'll be great! What kind of music does your band play?
That sounds really cool! I love rock music.
What's your favorite kind of music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably country.
Oh, I love country music too!
It's hard to choose just one, but I really like "The Dance" by Garth Brooks.
That's a great song! I love Garth Brooks.
Me too! He's one of my favorite artists.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! We should talk more sometime.
